BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses
Comment: Continuation of the August 11, 2015 - Recessed Meeting

Items.Title: Continuation of the August 11, 2015 - Recessed Meeting

Application No. 20155364 SCR pursuant to Section 1732 of the New York City School Construction Authority Act, concerning the proposed site selection for a new, approximately 345-seat annex building to serve the existing Curtis High School, located on Saint Marks Place west of Nicholas Street (Block 22, part of Lot 1), in the Borough of Staten Island, Community School District No. 31, Community Board 1, Council District 49.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
